top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos

comments_since_last_sample.body: Wow!!  I'm the generation who grew up with Saturday Night Fever and the BeeGees.  That was pure genius!!  I want to see more.
Reminds me of The Garden of Earthly Delights, excellent work!
This works so much better than I imagined
So well done!!!  Face melting awesomeness!!
This video is awesome. It makes me appreciate disco kind of.

Melodicka: "We're gonna do a Halloween Stayin' Alive."
Violet: "I dunno. Hasn't that been done a lot?"
Melodicka: "You get to be a really badass, creepy zombie."
Violet: "WTF took you so long?!! C'mon, people, move!"

Another home run! Y'all killed it. ;-) Stay alive...stay safe. >_>
Lol locked door .... you are getting eaten x
This is great, but you'll have to forgive me for still liking the Ozzy Osbourne and Dweezil Zappa cover the most.
